pullrequest.title: Fix compilation using gcc8 and add support for c++17

content.raw:
Sorry, I didn’t see this one when I went ahead and fixed.  I looked in the file that @sloretz mentioned above and saw this stanza:

    #ifndef isfinite
    #ifndef HAVE_ISFINITE
    #define HAVE_ISFINITE 1
    #define isfinite(x) finite(x)
    #endif
    #endif

‌

My understanding is that including `cmath` would make the `isfinite` symbol defined, but there may be something strange going on here, so I just pre-defined `HAVE_ISFINITE`.  

The other part of my PR was just Swig trickery to make sure that comes at the beginning of the generated code.

‌
